verbs.description: sound tigers’ koivula adapts to north america [ARG0: he] [V: settling] [ARGM-EXT: in a little] got an apartment with his girlfriend adapting to life in connecticut instead of finland otto koivula is adapting to life on the ice in north america too playing his first pro game over here on saturday for the bridgeport sound tigers my first game i was a bit nervous koivula said after wednesday practice at webster bank arena i did n't play that much but it was just a nice experience to feel the ahl it was a first game it going to be better koivula was on the fourth forward line in his ahl debut at allentown pa against the lehigh valley phantoms ilves special assignment nhl executive new york islanders hershey ahl north america khl brent thompson rochester allentown tampere hockey lehigh valley phantoms tigers militia jan kovar american hockey league tigers nokia jacques lemaire bridgeport sound tigers webster bank arena connecticut town bridgeport finland pa otto koivula
